item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 1, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:

13. Athletes/musicians pursue fundamentals more rigorously than knowledge workers (57 points | 50 comments)

25. Woolly mammoth 'de-extinction' is nearing reality (48 points | 70 comments)

27. Build Your Own Z80 Computer: Design Guidelines and Application (1981) (77 points | 20 comments)
